replies.body: I don't think you're going to need a very good computer to be able to max out minecraft and make quality recordings. I bought a $650 gaming computer called Avatar Gaming Desktop FX6164 and I can max out the settings and still get a solid 70 FPS, which is really all you need. It's really the best computer you can get for that amount of money or anything closely above it. Personally, I think buying a computer for over 1k would be a waste, so maybe get a good, cheap one like I suggested, then donate the rest of the money to charity or something :D
